heading: tragic loss of patience
summary: Many people who have been watching the ducks at the local lake have been waiting longer and longer for the ducks to return. Some say the ducks may never return.

heading: markets improve as money found behind couch
summary: Global markets have improved as a number of expired stamps have been added back into circulation.  One commentator noted 'I didn't know there was so much money in the world'.

heading: editor left unsupervised
summary: Nobody's watching me right now and I can write anything I like.
